sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A briefe treatise published by Walter Cary 1587, and now the fift time 1609. newly imprinted ; wherein are to be found diuers good and speciall helpes for many diseases ; and for any thing herein mentioned, as heretofore I referred the patientes to M. Gray, so now (he being dead) I referre them to M. Clapham ... Cary, Walter.
[6], 88 [i.e. 86] p.
By W. White, for the Company of Stationers, Imprinted at London : 1609.
"The hammer for the stone" has special t.p. Running title: Caryes farewell to physicke. Signatures: A⁸(-A1) B-E⁸ F⁸(-F8). Imperfect: page numbers 72-73 skipped in the numbering. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
